title: 153428757.mission Vs Outcomes
excerpt: Mom’s Organic Market’s mission is “to protect and restore the environment.”

children.text: Mom’s Organic Market’s mission is “to protect and restore the environment.”
It’s interesting they don’t say “to stop all pollution" or "to offset their carbon footprint by 50%.”
A mission is aspirational and actionable, but unlike a goal, flexible enough to guide long-term efforts.
And, because it’s not dependent on outside forces, Mom’s can stay true to its purpose even in the face of changing circumstances.
It’s not about what numbers they hit or what someone else
do–it’s about the consistent, ongoing commitment to making a positive impact.
